release.action: Added composite key helper for using inside cache implementation. It combines multiple values to form a single composite key.
Added utility for toString method output generation that is useful for debugging.
Added locker utilities that is used for locking builder objects.
Added OrderingUtils that add ordering functionality of objects that realizes Ordered interface.
Added javassist utilities that simplify work related to class enhancements.
Added encode utilities that is used for data encoding using standard crypt algorithms.
Added hibernate utilities and custom user types for enums.
Added base utilities that simplifies work with core java. They includes CollectionUtils, StringUtils, ReflectionUtils, I18nUtils.
